title: Himi 511
lyrics:
7.6.8.8.6.
1.
He ‘uke ha tulutā!
‘Aonga ki he hā?
Ka fakataha ni tulutā,
‘E fonu leva ‘a e ipu na,
‘O inu he fieinua.
2.
He fo’i ‘one’one na-
‘Aonga ki he hā?
Ka pā peau mei he moana,
‘Ikai taʻofi he maka na,
Ko ‘one’one ‘e lava.
3.
Ko si’i tamasi’i ko’ena-
‘Aonga ki he hā?
Ko Sīsū ne ne pehē, “Ke ha’u
Tamaiki iiki, he te nau taau
Ke fai ha ngāue ma’aku”.
4.
Vakai hono nima hena
‘Aonga ki he hā?
Ko hono nima ‘e lava noa
Ke tolo maka ke tō ha to’a,
Hange ko e folofola.
5.
He ngutu — momo’i me’a!
‘Aonga ki he hā?
Ko ‘enau hiva hosana ē
Na’e tuku ko e fungani pē,
Pea tala ke nau fai pē.
6.
He loto — he ‘uke’ukea!
‘Aonga ki he hā?
Ka fonu ‘ofa honau ‘Otua,
Hangē ha fonu ha ki’i tāputa-
Fangota ai ha fonua. *
